title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Turn off all media but the EIB Network. We've reached peak disinformation. Rush predicts a network will call race early for Biden tomorrow to tamp down GOP turnout. Election Day turnout is how elections are won and the left knows it. PA Democrat Lt. Gov. sounds alarm with photo of Trump rally crowd in Butler, PA. Obama introduces Biden, Biden doesn't come out. Rush predicted media would report polls tightening in final days. Montage of scared media saying polls are tightening. NPR says President Trump and Rush are "all in" for the 2020 election. How wouldn't we be? Maybe NPR thought Rush was going to fade away after cancer diagnosis. Silver says if Biden loses Pennsylvania, he's in trouble. New poll shows Trump leading in PA. Rush JIPs Trump NC rally. Note from Rush's friend on Nate Silver's reversal on Pennsylvania, Rush's impact on Trump voter enthusiasm. Turnout is the key to winning tomorrow. Analysis of the Iowa poll. Caller takes Rush's advice, turns some voters to Trump.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Peak media disinformation. Second analysis of Iowa poll. Never Trumpers, Bill Kristol on Iowa poll. CBS News suddenly sees GOP surge in battleground states. Biden campaign manager: Under no scenario will Trump be declared winner on election night. Rush talks to Eric Trump about his father’s fight to save this country. 57,000 people turned out to see Trump in Butler, PA.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Lt. Governor of PA tells skeptical CNN anchor that 57,000 turned out for Trump's Butler rally. Trump campaign manager Bill Stepien releases numbers that show why the race trending Trump in battleground states. Where are all the Biden surrogates, other than Obama? Biden screams unintelligibly. Flashback to our famous Ted Kennedy sound bite where he cannot be understood. Caller who tried to go to Trump Georgia rally. Jack Fowler of National Review on why he's Never Biden. Your vote counts, don't let them scare you out of it. Pittsburgh Post-Gazette endorses Trump, first time they've endorsed a Republican for president since 1972.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
